import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Slider from 'react-slick' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // import {FaChevronLeft, FaChevronRight} from 'react-icons' const Sanphamnoibat = () => { const sliderSettings = { arrowsScroll: 2, // initialSlide: true, arrows: true, rows: 2, slidesToShow: 5, swipe: true, dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, // enable center mode }; const [settings, setSettings] = useState(sliderSettings); const hotelCards = [ { id: 1, imageSrc: const onChangeCenterMode = e => { if (e.target.checked) { setSettings({ ...sliderSettings, centerMode: true, centerPadding: '50px' }); } else { setSettings(sliderSettings); } } return (
CustomSlider {hotelCards.map((card, index) => (

{card.title}

{card.description}

))}
) } export default Sanphamnoibat
